targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  value
FROM device_data
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND
  device = $device
ORDER BY timestamp

SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  device AS metric,
  value AS "Online"
FROM device_data
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
ORDER BY timestamp

panels.description: Count of timestamps where the device was marked as UP.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  device AS metric,
  SUM(value="1") AS "value"
FROM device_data
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
GROUP BY device,2
ORDER BY device

panels.title: Total Device Uptime
